description:
Ippo mounts a desperate, full frontal assault as Sawamura continues to toy with him.
Determined to take back the pace, Ippo begins to dodge the Bullets and get into a rhythm as he strikes back. Almost naturally he falls into the Dempsey Roll pattern, and Sawamura makes his move!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 完全なるデンプシー破り
